remarks: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema) on nonnegative integers, a deduction version.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2018.)
statement:
nn0indd.1 $e |- ( x = 0 -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
nn0indd.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
nn0indd.3 $e |- ( x = ( y + 1 ) -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
nn0indd.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> et ) ) $.
nn0indd.5 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
nn0indd.6 $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ y e. NN0 ) /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
nn0indd $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. NN0 ) -> et ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d et x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
